ratings.comment: Trevor does not mandate attendance for lectures, but he does encourage students to come. Attending lecture is worthwhile for Trevor provides short activites that not only slightly boost students' grades, but helps students remember information from previous lectures. Outside of class, Trevor is available to help with class work and personal issues.

In one word: AMAZING. His knowledge is unparalleled, his teaching style is unmatched, and his genuine teaching style is unlike any other you will experience. I decided to meet up with Trevor one day after a class to talk about some topics, and it was one of the best decisions I could've made. Highly recommend taking his classes.
